The CEO signs a contract with a low-exponent RSA signature. Intercept the signature, 0x241c097aca122dda38a4a2e6aa787197474544465c1264462f1978f7e9d682ccbb325b147efd73738aa7c3d48c1706dd59a5c65033449e4c284d404842c8b5f6, and recover the original message to reveal their secret deal.

Public Key (n, e): (7486440299023022588556465283160451820029951633539244854343038664403512160481415181114586209495779250536241756806340838493430238251121390022204527537164429, 3)

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{qz57vnn5}
ciphertext: 0x241c097aca122dda38a4a2e6aa787197474544465c1264462f1978f7e9d682ccbb325b147efd73738aa7c3d48c1706dd59a5c65033449e4c284d404842c8b5f6
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (7486440299023022588556465283160451820029951633539244854343038664403512160481415181114586209495779250536241756806340838493430238251121390022204527537164429, 3)
